entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Document.Tests.Perf_EnumerateArray #67176
  • System.Text.Json ObjectConverter does not handle reference metadata correctly on deserialization #67171
    7.0.0
  • Logging Source Generator fails with a InvalidCastException #67167
    7.0.0
  • `System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests` failures on `coreclr windows x64 Debug` #67164
  • `Libraries Test Run checked coreclr OSX x64 Debug` failing to unzip test assets #67159
  • fannkuch-redux-9 fails on many core computers #67157
  • [API Proposal]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 2/3) #67156
  • ReadAtLeastAsync(0) has different behavior between DefaultPipeReader and StreamPipeReader #67155
  • [wasm] Consider not AOT'ing `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.dll` to reduce resource usage #67153
  • OSR failure in System.Text.Json.Tests #67152
    7.0.0
  • Add support for Int128 and UInt128 data types #67151
    Future
  • Different Exit code when IHost stops from failing (async)IHostedService #67146
  • Random exceptions when calling System.Type.GetInterface #67144
  • [API Proposal]: Possibility to specify a custom naming for appsettings.json files #67142
  • Mono crashes with SEGV_ACCERR for P/Invoke in android Debug #67140
  • Resolving path to configuration files #67139
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Tests.MetricEventSourceTests.EventSourceFiltersInstruments #67134
  • Enumerable.Chunk throws OutOfMemoryException for very large chunk sizes. #67132

Closed

  • Skipping Json StreamTests.HandleCollectionsAsync test #35927
    7.0.0
  • Expression interpreter - Remove dead code #15440
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Specify supported custom type marshalling features on CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute #66121
    7.0.0
  • Attributes and Analyzer Diagnostics to support custom struct marshalling in the DllImport Source Generator #46838
    7.0.0
  • Segmentation fault when run by `execve()` with relative path #67127
  • [wasm][aot] `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Roslyn3.11.Tests` fail while linking due to OOM #66647
  • [wasm][aot] `System.Text.Json` tests fail while linking due to OOM #61524
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] Fails to compile `.bc` to `.o` for `System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Roslyn4.0.Tests.dll.bc` due to `SIGKILL (-9)` #65411
  • [wasm][aot] Fails to compile `.bc` to `.o` for `System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Roslyn3.11.Tests.dll.bc` due to `SIGKILL (-9)` #65356
    7.0.0
  • Add an (U)Int128 type #20640
    Future
  • Quarantine ReadAsync_WithAllowInputFormatterExceptionMessages_RegistersJsonInputExceptionsAsInputFormatterException #66590
    7.0.0
  • OSR stress failure in System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticsSource.Tests #67078
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: QUIC should have an IsSupported API #65802
    7.0.0
  • Suboptimal codegen for `default(SomeValueType)` #67116

PullRequests

Created

  • [Group 5] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Xml` #67178
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1683074 #67177
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Regex.Tests: Disable test that tries to blow the stack, on AOT #67175
    arch-wasm, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [Group 6] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Configuration` #67174
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Add \<para> tags to remarks comments #67173
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Allow caller-allocated buffer for `CustomTypeMarshaller` to be `Span` of any unmanaged type for Value marshalling #67172
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Reflection.Emit cleanups #67170
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix jit attach hang at Shutdown #67166
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [MAUI][PERF] Maui Perf add iOS Podcast SOD Tests #67165
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Single-file debugging support in DBI and createdump #67163
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • System.Runtime no longer needs to enable preview features #67162
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • Support binding to immutable types #43662 #67161
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Change `CrossLoaderAllocatorHash` to not use the GC #67160
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Obsolete outdated constructors on Rfc2898DeriveBytes #67158
    area-System.Security, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Fix Missing Metadata for ThreadPool Event #67150
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • Use generic `Enum` methods in more places. #67147
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Add dynamic shim for SSL_CTX_set_options and SSL_set_options #67145
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: Optimize range checks for X >> CNS and for short/byte indices #67141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix read of image_info while raising image_unload event #67138
    area-System.Diagnostics-mono, community-contribution
  • Add struct info to JitDump for INDEX and IND nodes #67135
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix loop cloning of array of struct with array field #67130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Design to support ByRefLike types in Generics #67129
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix a case of infinite retries while allocating at LOH boundary by constraining retries #67128
    area-GC-coreclr

Merged

  • Refactor HandleCollectionsAsync to an xunit Theory #67126
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Disable multi-level lookup by default #67022
    area-Host, 7.0.0
  • Expose the custom type marshalling types for source-generated interop. #67052
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Update Ubuntu version names in the workflow docs #67169
  • PoC TLS resume on Linux client #64369
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] Run the high resource AOT tests on build machine itself #67017
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Avoid empty array allocation in MethodBase.GetParameterTypes #67149
    area-System.Reflection
  • Remove some array allocations from RuntimeType.CreateInstanceImpl #67148
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Infra for regeneration of third-party-notices file #60091
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [perf] Set job name for the performance jobs #67124
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.TraceSource` #66892
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Deduplicate project files with the same name in different folders #64841
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Delete unused native code in src/native #67087
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Revert "[mono][workload] Add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation" #67154
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][workload] Add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation #65089
    area-Build-mono
  • perf: Pass --dotnet-path to use dotnet-workload for wasm #66795
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix error reporting for objects with unsupported property types #67109
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Exclude throwinnestedtrycatch_il_r from Arm runs #67122
  • JIT: block some struct promotion for OSR #67131
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable multimodule test #67137
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Stabilize summary blobs #67086
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add dynamic shim for SSL_CTX_set_options and SSL_set_options #67030
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Debug` #66862
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Add tighter bound to range check for matching Regex char classes #67133
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Enable CA1822 (Mark members as static) analyzer #66333
    area-Meta
  • Don't throw PNSE on QuicImplementationProvider.IsSupported #67036
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [mono][wasm] Store the exception object in a GC handle while it is be… #67121
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Replace bool[] arrays with Span<bool> in XML deserialization #66914
    area-Serialization, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Update fabricbot instructions #67073
    area-Meta

Updated

  • [wasm] document marshalling internals #63885
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fix race condition in loading assemblies with composite native images #67000
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [PERF] Added --logbuildoutput to microbenchmark runs. #67111
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fixes #64159 - JsonSerializerContext source generation fails with keyword identifiers #66876
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, source-generator
  • Change ConfigurationBinder to avoid reading properties unnecessarily. #66723
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Fixes #42643 allow keys with colons in JSON config #66886
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Try to fix a time-sensitive thread pool test #66765
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Add metrics for caching #66479
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Fix static virtual calls to generic methods from gshared code #66739
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use ROS<byte> instead of byte[] where it makes sense on S.S.C.Cose #66741
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Managed implementation of NTLM for Android and tvOS #66879
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm] improve I64 memory access #64845
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Debuger tests refactor 63667 #63730
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix NTAuthentication.MakeSignature/VerifySignature on Linux #65679
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Do not generate `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_FLD` nodes #66251
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't apply IMAGE_REL_BASED_REL32 when address doesn't belong to current section #66855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Multiple enveloped signatures #67010
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Load R2R images on osx-arm64 according to Apple's guidelines #67118
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable string properties evaluation of Length and Char[]. #67028
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Improved error handling in debug proxy #65828
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Improve exception thrown when constructing SslCertificateTrust #66763
  • Perform reachability analysis before codegen #66967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #63356
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [WIP] Refactoring and perf of reflection Invoke #66357
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Add support for creating delegates to static virtual methods #66936
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix KeepNativeSymbols to work on mono as well #66594
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Issue at most one connection attempt per request #67114
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Methods on primitives 65707 #66654
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Zip64ExtraField reads StartDiskNumber as uint32 #62959
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [debugger][wasm] ValueTypeClass refactoring. #63626
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Refactor suggested in 65842 #66821
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Double the size of the previous segment #66930
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Do not call into MsQuic inside a lock #67037
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Ensure serializer reflection-dependency sentinel is accurate #67104
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.5
  • Align API surface of immutable collections and their corresponding builder types #66550
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • Replace 2 allocations from string.ToCharArray() with ReadOnlySpan in System.Private.Xml library #67002
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Optimize bswap+mov to movbe on xarch #66965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove char[] allocations from RegistryKey #66918
    area-Microsoft.Win32, tenet-performance

PullRequests

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SDK should expose available WarningLevel values as MSBuild items #24570
  • Net472 projects referencing netstandard via a netstandard library not recognized as NETStandard dependent #24559

Closed

  • .NET 6.0.3 fails when installing from Windows Update #24294
  • Reenable WinMDInteropProjectCanBeReferenced test after suggested fixes #24326
  • Ability to view System.Diagnostics.Process memory usage and cpu time after exit #24531

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable arm64 targeting for .Net Framework 4.8.1 and newer #24566
    Area-NetSDK
  • changed names of `dotnet new` providers #24565
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update to the 6.0.3 runtime for preview 3 #24563
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cherry pick #24130 #24562
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Revert 23358 #24561
  • SDK integration via BundledNetCoreApp #24550
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.2xx' #24549
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Porting a 6.0 error message improvement that I should have targeted at 3xx originally #24557
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Renable the test based on feedback. #24447
  • Make the net6 warning when running in 16.11 say or higher #24431
  • Remove 'reflecting any global.json' from info label #24541
    Area-CLI
  • Port the prep machine change and the helix update to VS 2022 #24412
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1682892 #24395
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #24446
  • Pin the compiler version in RSG to an exact version #24130
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Revert #23358 #24538

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider gracefully recovering from erroneous use of 'unchecked' in operator declaration #60394
  • Formatting of certain brace types is not configurable. #60390
  • Typing await followed by space puts a space between method name and the parentheses #60389
  • VS 2022 suggesting code breaking simplifications #60387
  • [Broken test] Roslyn.VisualStudio.NewIntegrationTests.CSharp.CSharpGoToBase.GoToBaseFromMetadataAsSource #60386
  • C# Refactor actions missing for removing redundant else statements #60385
  • When I copy text which includes a stack trace, the Stack Trace Explorer window appears, covering other content #60382
  • The Type property from a IPropertySymbol is null / throws exception? #60380
  • Records with `;` body break references to members from record attribute #60379
    17.2

Closed

  • Attribute to disallow usage of positional parameters (avoid breaking change in source generated code) #60263
  • Renaming / refactoring positional record properties does not working when renamed in the parameter list. #60353
  • Use synthesized wrapper methods for compiler-generated 'throw's #59601
    17.2
  • `[SuppressMessage]` should be able to suppress `dotnet_style_namespace_match_folder` warnings #60361
    17.2
  • Non-public classes are visible while non-public methods aren't? #60360
  • AnalyzeDataFlow fails for stackalloc array creation initializer expression #60134
    17.2

PullRequests

Created

  • [LSP] Explicitly define the completion items to resolve #60393
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Support SetsRequiredMembersAttribute #60392
    Area-Compilers
  • Add BoundArrayInitialization.IsInferred #60391
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Disallow 'nameof(field)' #60384
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add feature to convert from top-level-statements to Program.Main form #60383
    Area-IDE
  • Move IDE0078 codefix to Analyzers #60378
    Area-IDE, Community

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60344
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Skip failing test GoToBaseFromMetadataAsSource #60388
    Area-IDE, Next
  • VSMac external access for types required to startup the roslyn LSP server #60330
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Add formatter and smart indentation tests for checked operators #60375
    Area-IDE, LSP, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Use synthesized methods for compiler-generated switch exceptions #59975
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Suppress nullable property/field initialization warning for required members #60243
    Area-Compilers
  • AbstractFlowPass.VisitStackAllocArrayCreation should use the regular way for visiting initializer #60210
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/required-members #60373
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Do not run CI for non code files #60327
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Update breaking change document and compiler test plan for UTF8 String Literals #60372
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals

Updated

  • Don't offer to use patterns when they won't work #60370
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.3 #60314
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [LSP] Remove the majority of usages of client name. #60357
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Extend scope of type parameters in attributes #40525
    Area-Compilers, C# 11.0
  • Delay async taggers and navbars for files that are not visible #60367
    Area-IDE
  • Check accessibility before offering "Implement interface" codefix #60297
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Workspace config options #59790
    Area-IDE
  • Move more package initialization to BG. #60211
    Area-IDE
  • Add FixAll in containing type/member support for code fixes #59989
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • Fix a race condition in IDE diagnostic service for stale diagnostics #60365
    Area-IDE, 17.2.P2
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support lambdas and local functions, eliminate duplicate code #60335
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Speed up VisualStudioProject construction #60351
    Area-IDE
  • Increase delay for getting compilation-available notifications from OOP #60369
    Area-IDE
  • Features/utf8 string literals #59774
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Form fields in web pages in project templates appear squished together #40887
  • Kestrel should ignore Content-Length for 204 responses #40883
  • Kestrel should ignore Content-Length: 0 on a WebSocket upgrade #40882
  • Add template option to generate explicit Program class with Main method instead of top-level statements #40877
    7.0-preview4
  • Adding MessagePack causes TypeLoadException #40876
  • Update SpaProxy to work with http-proxy-middleware 2.x. #40875
  • SignalR Java Client not working in Android 12 #40874
  • Blazor Server scoped CSS missing after dotnet publish on Azure Pipelines #40873
  • Can't established SignalR connection as negotiate results in 404 #40870
  • Add support for Private Network Access (CORS header Access-Control-Allow-Private-Network) #40869
  • different input tag helper behavior in a for and foreach loop #40868
  • Use IEquatable for Blazor object parameters to optimize rendering by default #40867
  • CS8669 in Razor generated code #40866

Closed

  • Some tests involving the W3CLoggerProcessor fail #40844
  • Support for a standard router in the new one or extension of the current one with additional parameters. #39719
    Discussions
  • HttpLoggingMiddleware + Websockets/Upgrade #31962
    7.0-preview4
  • Blazor <InputFile> component throws Uncaught (in promise) Error #40772
  • Unskip `IdentityUIScriptsTest` on macOS 10.15 #38542
    Test failures
  • Updating Blazor Server app in IIS causes exception when calling ProtectedLocalStorage #40862
  • Test failure: ThrowsWhenBindingLocalhostToIPv4AddressInUse #33185
    Test failures
  • Update cert auth tests to generate certs dynamically instead #32813
    7.0-preview4
  • Quarantine StaticFiles.DefaultFilesMiddlewareTests.* #40642
  • Is .net core compatible with IIS Webdav module ? #40838
  • blazor.webassembly.js:2 Unhandled Promise Rejection: TypeError: Body is disturbed or locked #40872
  • How I can cross compile SignalR C++ Client on raspberry pi(armv7l)? #40815
  • Blazor Server project template: Static assets versioning with `asp-append-version` tag-helpers #40818

PullRequests

Created

  • Add option to project templates to use Program.Main instead of top-level statements #40886
  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Increase a few IIS test timeouts #40884
    area-runtime
  • Harden AssertRecycle #40878
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Use UtcNow instead of Now in W3CLogger Tests #40881
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • HttpLoggingMiddleware + Websockets/Upgrade #40841
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview4
  • Switch to dynamic cert gen for tests #39685
    area-security, 7.0-preview3
  • Don't use yarn.msbuild SDK in source-build #40864
    area-blazor
  • Update SDK, Unquarantine tests #40858
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Included githubactions in dependabot config #40851
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Add RID to targeting pack archive names #40731
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [6.0] Allow leading CR/LF in HTTP request lines in Kestrel #40859
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Add gRPC JSON transcoding #40242
    area-grpc

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dotnet-dump should get process handle directly with OpenProcess #2950

Updated

  • dotnet-trace prints "Unable to examine process." (when run in Kudu command line on App Service) #2781
    .NET 7.0
  • dotnet-trace: unhandled exception results in a broken trace #2954
  • dotnet-sos experience on macOS arm64 #2877
    .NET 7.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add ThreadState to the set of allowed APIs in lldb #2951
  • Fix dotnet-dump collect on half exited process #2959

Updated

  • Add single file debugging support to dbgshim #2941
  • Modify hosting to account for system assemblies in 5.0+ runtimes #2930

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • BarBackgroundColor and BarTextColor don't change color on Android #5590
  • Shift Handler?.UpdateValue to happen after all PropertyChanged events have fired #5587
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • XamlC should optimize OnPlatform #5583
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [WinUI] Button.LineBreakMode currently not working #5580
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • UILabel VerticalTextAlignment not working on iOS when there's a background #5575
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Better XAML Compilation for Styles #5574
  • Boxview corner radius not working in Mac OS and iOS #5572
    6.0.300-servicing
  • bad grid layout #5571
    6.0.300
  • opacity is ignored for Image background #5568
  • border bug #5567
  • image size calculation #5565

Closed

  • Label.FormattedText does not support FontAttributes on Android, crashes on Windows #5576
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Microsoft.Maui.Dispatching.IDispatcherTimer frequently fires too early #5335
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • MAUI Blazor cannot get html element dimension using javascript #5585
  • [Bug] Dismissing iOS Modal Form Page causes NRE #2948
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] Shadow effect not showing in WinUI #4471
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Alignment on MacCatalyst is now incorrect after recent FlowDirection changes #5537
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • [iOS] Preview 14 Shell Tabbar Renders as Blank White Screen on iOS #5549
  • [iOS] Preview 14 Shell Flyout Menu Renders Fullscreen when App Initially Opens #5550
  • Placeholder text alignment is wrong on windows #3808
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Warning throws for tabid syntax with stylecop analyzers #4226
  • After update VS 2022 android maui project not build XamlCompiler error WMC1007 #5469
  • Label HorizontalOptions are backwards #5564

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid reconstructing handler when it is already available #5591
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Clip image to ImageView bounds when using CenterCrop (AspectFill) #5589
  • [android] update to the latest AndroidX packages #5588
  • Better VSMac workaround #5584

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hybrid TPT and TPH #27707
  • Overriding Parameters property of SqliteCommand does not work #27706
  • Can not specify Properties of Owned type via Fluent API #27705
  • What causes differences in verbosity between IDesignTimeDbContextFactory class library and console application project? #27704
  • Enum with EnumToStringConverter always returns 0 in query if casted #27703
  • Enabling TPT with default table name. #27702
  • Allow migrations bundle executable to run arbitrary script. #27701
  • .Contains method generate different commands if it take its value from variable or directly #27700

Closed

  • Regression: GroupBy with operation on a nullable date fail when there is a where with a condition on a sub collection #27708
  • THIRD-PARTY-NOTICES.TXT needed for efcore repo? #27699
  • Including a related entity B inside query for A results in unpredictable state of collection of B in entity C #27678
  • After upgrading from EF 6.0.1 to EF 6.0.2: broken query generation when using aggregate #27621
  • `EF.Property` is not working in `.Include`. Is it a bug or intended? #27672
  • Bug: dotnet-ef --output-dir ignored for ApplicationDbContextModelSnapshot and placing in default folder #27631
  • Allow migration bundles to include migrations for multiple contexts #27685
  • FirstOrDefault when using datetime type fails #27684
  • Spatialite causes native crash in spatial tests on Ubuntu impish #27662

PullRequests

Updated

  • Update tool to roll forward to latest major version of runtime installed. #27671

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Internal MSBuild Error: "DefiningProjectFullPath" is not a valid item-spec modifier #13471

Closed

  • The Templates version and Runtime version of “.NET Runtime” and “ASP.NET Core Runtime” in .NET 7.0 Preview 3 SDK are 7.0.0-preview.4.xxx. #13467

PullRequests

Created

  • Update the table for preview 3 #13472
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #13469

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #13461

Updated

  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add the Red Hat test suite as a smoke test for source-build #13418
